function.name: faucet_usdc
function.description: Dispense test USDC. Dispenses 10 test USDC on Base Sepolia to the given wallet address.

address.description: EVM-compatible wallet address (42-char hex, checksummed or lowercase)

function.name: faucet_eth
function.description: Dispense test ETH. Dispenses 0.01 test ETH on Base Sepolia to the given wallet address.

address.description: EVM-compatible wallet address (42-char hex, checksummed or lowercase)

function.name: faucet_status
function.description: Check rate limit status. Returns the current rate limit status for a wallet address across both faucet types (USDC and ETH).
